question: Scenario: You are creating a student information page that displays basic details of student using a table. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Student Information Table Caption: Students Details Table Columns: RollNo, Name, Age, Skill Table Rows: Add sample students with any data. Requirements: - Use table tag for the table. - Use caption for the table title. - Use th for table headers. - Use tr for rows. - Use td for data cells.
sampleInput: Title => Student Information Table Caption => Students Details Headers: RollNo, Name, Age, Skill Rows: - 101, John, 20, Java - 102, Smith, 22, React
description: Create a table with caption, headers, and rows using standard HTML table tags.

question: Scenario: You are creating an employee information page that displays basic details of employees using a table. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Employee Information Table Caption: Employee Details Table Columns: Id, name, salary, email, image, Resume Table Rows: Add sample employees with any data. Requirements: - Use table tag with border="1". - Use caption for the table title. - Use th for headers. - Use td for data. - Use img tag to display the image (use any placeholder URL or 'profile.jpg'). - Use a tag for the resume link.
sampleInput: Title => Employee Information Caption => Employee Details Headers: Id, name, salary, email, image, Resume Sample Data: - 101, Alice, 50000, alice@example.com, [Image], [Link] - 102, Bob, 60000, bob@example.com, [Image], [Link]
answer:
Employee Details
Id name salary email image Resume
101 Alice 50000 alice@example.com View Resume
102 Bob 60000 bob@example.com View Resume
sampleOutput:
Employee Details
IdnamesalaryemailimageResume
101Alice50000alice@example.comView Resume
102Bob60000bob@example.comView Resume
description: Create a table with images and links inside cells.

question: Scenario: You are designing a webpage for your store or business to display a monthly sales report. This table will help the sales manager quickly see which products were sold, in what quantity, at what price, and the total revenue generated for each product. At the bottom, a total row will summarize the overall sales for the month. Create a webpage that displays: Title: Sales Report Table Caption: Monthly Sales Table Columns: Product, Quantity, Price, Total Requirements: - Use thead for column headers - Use tbody for product data - Use tfoot for the total row - Use table tag with border="1"
sampleInput: Title => Sales Report Caption => Monthly Sales Headers: Product, Quantity, Price, Total Sample Data: - Laptop, 2, 500, 1000 - Mouse, 5, 20, 100 Total: Total Sales: 1100
answer:
Monthly Sales
Product Quantity Price Total
Laptop 2 500 1000
Mouse 5 20 100
Total Sales 1100
description: Create a table using thead, tbody, and tfoot tags.

question: Scenario: You are working on an inventory management system. Create a table that categorizes products and displays their sales details. Use rowspan to group products under the same category and colspan for the total row. Create a webpage that displays: Table Columns: Category, Product, Quantity, Price, Total Requirements: - Use rowspan="3" for 'Electronics' and 'Furniture' categories. - Use colspan="2" for the 'Total' label in the final row. - The 'Total' row should display the grand total: 1550000. - Use a table border of 1.
sampleInput: Headers: Category, Product, Quantity, Price, Total Electronics (Rowspan 3): - Laptop, 10, 50000, 500000 - Mobile, 20, 15000, 300000 - Tablet, 15, 20000, 300000 Furniture (Rowspan 3): - Chair, 25, 2000, 50000 - Table, 10, 5000, 50000 - Sofa, 5, 15000, 75000 Total (Colspan 2): 1550000
answer:
Category Product Quantity Price Total
Electronics Laptop 10 50000 500000
Mobile 20 15000 300000
Tablet 15 20000 300000
Furniture Chair 25 2000 50000
Table 10 5000 50000
Sofa 5 15000 75000
Total 1550000
description: Create a table using rowspan and colspan attributes.
